name: assistant-skills-marketplace
description: Templates and tools for building Claude Code Assistant Skills projects. Production-ready skills for project scaffolding, optimization, and branding.

plugins.name: assistant-skills
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Claude Code skills. Includes project scaffolding wizard, skill optimizer, and landing page generator. Derived from 40+ production skill implementations.

plugins.name: splunk-assistant-skills
plugins.description: 14 specialized skills for Splunk REST API automation. Natural language search, job management, exports, alerts, and administration. 62 production-ready scripts with 248 tests.

plugins.name: confluence-assistant-skills
plugins.description: 14 specialized skills for Confluence Cloud automation. Natural language page management, CQL search with export, comments, attachments, labels, permissions, and JIRA integration. 88 scripts with 1,039 tests.
